text.text: Coming soon to bookshelves near you.

ALRIGHT YOU TINKERS LISTEN UP. I am the one and only §lTHRUUL M'GON§r and my two new upcoming books §oPuny Smelting§r and §oMighty Smelting§r will teach you how to use much better materials, melt your metals, alloy, and SO MUCH MORE.
I've got a whole lot of stuff made out of slime, gunpowder, and all the weirdest stuff that you could possibly think of! Coming soon in §oTinker's Gadgetry§r by Melvin
There is nothing quite as fantastic as a foundry. Learn more in  §oFantastic Foundry§r by Namea
